response.name: 422: Validation error

request.description:
### Logout

This endpoint is used to log the user out of the system.

#### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

#### Response

- `message` (string): A message indicating the status of the logout operation.
    

Example:

``` json
{
    "message": ""
}

 ```
